messages.subject: conference workshop was progress
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/24/02 11:10:23 AM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/24/02 11:10:23 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< I would be interested too. Where do I send my dollar???? Also, was it
taped? If so do you know how I could get a copy and the cost?
thanks for sharing this, >>

If you want a copy of the handout, just email me your address. I will only
start charging if a lot of people want it. I can afford to mail a few without
stress :)
LeAanne should have our website up and running very soon, I will post the
link here as soon as it's ready.
We will have links to unschooling information, essays and articles, ideas and
recipes for fun also.
But the conference workshop handout thingy, is simply a list of ways to use
things like boxes, newspaper and other common household items to make some
fun or games.

Ren
